New Records: Anthony Edwards made 50 threes in the first nine games of the season, only the second player after Stephen Curry to achieve this feat.
Key Match Events: Anthony Edwards scored 37 points, making 12-21 from the field and 15 three-point attempts.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Defenders going under screens is allowing Ant too much time to shoot the ball.
Others: Anthony Edwards has become only the second player after Stephen Curry to achieve making 50 threes in the first nine games of the season.
